stories.title: Boring Place to Go
stories.body: The travelers were sad to see that they had gone really really far to find only a tiny place with one noddy.

stories.title: Excited People
stories.summary: Everywhere you look in this town people are excited
stories.body: Traveling to the town of Loud, you first notice that shouts of people followed by immediate epizeuxis.  It is really annoying!
stories.definition: Immediate repetition of a word for emphasis

stories.title: Hiking in The Back Woods
stories.body: Nancy was very foolish and headed into the mountains.  They were very steep with narrow trails and she almost fell into the khor.
